verbose_text: These modifications involve both histone methylation and acetylation, such as H3K4 monomethylation and H3K27 acetylation induced by LPS, and histone H3K4 trimethylation and H3K27 acetylation caused by beta-glucan.
evidence: acetylation induced by LPS                           , and histone H3K4 trimethylation and H3K27 acetylation caused by beta-glucan
